com.google.gwt.editor.client.impl
Class SimpleViolation

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.editor.client.impl.SimpleViolation

public abstract class SimpleViolation
extends java.lang.Object

Abstraction of a ConstraintViolation or a RequestFactory Violation object. Also contains a factory method to create SimpleViolation instances from ConstraintViolation objects.

Constructor Summary

          Typically constructed via factory methods.

          Return a dotted path describing the property.

          An object that should be available from EditorError.getUserData().
